channel.title: Crafting
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm thinking about coding crafting (or is there one already out there?) anyways, im just wondering, is there a way to like, open up a interface in ur chatbox place, for like choosing what you wanna craft? Like is there a way I can make it do that? Or is there one already made? Just wondering.

under
